front.title: Mean round-trip times in the ARPANET

author.organization: University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA), New Media Centers (NMC)
University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA), New Media Centers (NMC)

abstract.t: In one of our current measurement projects we are interested in the average values of important network parameters. For this purpose we collect data on the network activity over seven consecutive days. This data collection is only interrupted by down-time or maintenance of either the net or our collecting facility (the "late" Sigma-7 or, in future, the 360/91 at CCN).
